emission
																                    Treatment of childhood acute myeloid leukemia (AML) during the remission phase (consolidation /intensification therapy) depends on the subtype of AML and may include the following:          -  Combination chemotherapy.     -  High-dose chemotherapy followed by stem cell transplant using blood stem cells from a donor.     - A clinical trial of chemotherapy followed by an infusion of natural killer cells.    - A clinical trial of combination chemotherap
